comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: On Jan 20, 1915, he was due to give testimony at the Federal Commission on Industrial Relations at "the City Hall" according to the NYT of Jan 20, 1915. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E02E4DF1E3FE633A...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you, swanq. We'll fill in more of this information the next time we update the record.
